altername_name: Geronimo Stilton: Return to the Kingdom of Fantasy
name: Geronimo Stilton: Return to the Kingdom of Fantasy: The Videogame
overview: Geronimo Stilton, editor-in-chief of The Rodent’s Gazette, never thought he’d return to the Kingdom of Fantasy. But when the Queen of the Fairies sent him a letter asking for his help, he had the strangest feeling that a brand new adventure was just about to begin. Get ready for a spectacular story you’ll never forget. Find the Map of Paradise and make an amazing journey to the Heart of Happiness. Store items in Geronimo’s backpack to help you solve over 60 puzzles and mini-games. Go deeper into the Kingdom of Fantasy and make a whole host of new friends.
